delete.title: Confirm deletion
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action is irreversible.
delete.messageFacility: Are you sure you want to delete the facility "{{name}}"? This action is irreversible.
delete.messageProperty: Are you sure you want to delete the property "{{name}}"? This action is irreversible and will also delete all associated data.
delete.messagePropertyContent: Are you sure you want to delete the content for "{{name}}"? This action is irreversible.
delete.messagePropertyPhoto: Are you sure you want to delete the photo for "{{property}}"? This action is irreversible.
delete.messagePropertyFacility: Are you sure you want to delete the link between "{{property}}" and "{{facility}}"? This action is irreversible.
delete.messagePropertySettings: Are you sure you want to delete the settings for "{{name}}"? This action is irreversible.
delete.messageGroup: Are you sure you want to delete the group "{{name}}"? This action is irreversible.
delete.messageReservationAdvancePolicy: Are you sure you want to delete the advance policy "{{name}}"? This action is irreversible.
delete.messageReservationAdvancePolicyDateRange: Are you sure you want to delete this date range? This action is irreversible.
delete.messageReservationCancellationPolicy: Are you sure you want to delete the cancellation policy "{{name}}"? This action is irreversible.
delete.messageReservationCancellationPolicyDate: Are you sure you want to delete this date range? This action is irreversible.
delete.messageRatePlan: Are you sure you want to delete the rate plan "{{name}}"? This action is irreversible.
delete.messageTaxSet: Are you sure you want to delete the tax set "{{name}}"? This action is irreversible.
delete.messageTaxSetItem: Are you sure you want to delete the tax item "{{name}}"? This action is irreversible.
